Texto: 
left sided horner syndrome
anticoagulation
dissection of the left internal carotid artery beginning just above the common carotid bifurcation.
left internal carotid dissection
• carotid dissection
• carotid thrombosis
• fibromuscular dysplasia (fmd)
56 year old woman who developed left sided headache and ptosis following a coughing spell 6 days prior to admission.
cta also revealed an aneurysm of the anterior communicating artery.

very ectatic right ica with complex loop in the neck
